snippets.title: Create window
snippets.snippet:
# flags: https://docs.omniverse.nvidia.com/py/kit/source/extensions/omni.ui/docs/index.html?omni.ui.add_to_namespace
# dock: https://docs.omniverse.nvidia.com/py/kit/source/extensions/omni.ui/docs/index.html?#omni.ui.DockPreference
window_flags = ui.WINDOW_FLAGS_NONE

window = ui.Window("${1:window_name}", 
                   width=640, height=480, 
                   flags=window_flags,
                   dockPreference=ui.DockPreference.DISABLED, 
                   visible=True)
